ValidationRule.description: If a rep trys to sell PGi UC products on a deal that is not UpSell and was created after 1/20/20 then they will be blocked, they must sell TPC UC products.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Product2.Family,"Unified Communications"), DATEVALUE(Opportunity.CreatedDate) >= DATE (2020,01,20), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Opportunity_Deal_Type__c,"Up-Sell (Rev Increase)")), Opportunity.RecordType.Name = "PGi Opportunity" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PGi's UCaaS Products are not allowed to be sold anymore for new business deals, please select a TPX UCaaS Product offering.
